sentences.english: The mechanic did a quick and dirty repair on my car.
sentences.chinese: 那個機械師潦潦草草地修了我的車。

sentences.english: Learn " to " re-check engine light from the mechanic.
sentences.chinese: 學習重置檢查引擎輕程序從一個機械師。

sentences.english: Trade certification for automotive machinists is available, but voluntary, in Ontario.
sentences.chinese: 在安大略省汽車機械師行業認證可用，但是自願的，。

sentences.english: Isser had arranged for a special crew and team of mechanics for the flight.
sentences.chinese: 伊塞爲這次飛行安排了特別的機組人員和機械師。

sentences.english: Aircraft instrument, electrical and avionics mechanics, technicians and inspectors.
sentences.chinese: 航空器，航空電子設備機械師，技術員和檢測員。

sentences.english: The machinists wanted more pay for running new machines.
sentences.chinese: 機械師爲開新機器要求加薪。

sentences.english: All the machinists have put in for a rise.
sentences.chinese: 全體機械師都提出了增加工資的申請。

sentences.english: You can work as a mechanic, you don't need to have gone to high school.
sentences.chinese: 你能做一名機械師，而你不需要讀過高中。

sentences.english: The mechanics of the garage are repairing the car which had a car crash.
sentences.chinese: 汽修廠的機械師們正在修一輛剛剛出了車禍的車。

sentences.english: This occupation group covers Wood Machinists and Wood Trades Workers not elsewhere classified.
sentences.chinese: 包括在其他地方未分類的木工機械師和木材業技工。

sentences.english: Weber is working in a garage as a mechanician .
sentences.chinese: 韋伯在汽車修理廠作機械師。

sentences.english: My boyfriend, Tim, a mechanic, does work for the Air Force Academy.
sentences.chinese: 我的男友提姆是一位爲空軍學院工作的機械師。

sentences.english: Ask any machinist what he thinks of Chinese metals.
sentences.chinese: 去問問任何一個機械師，問他怎麼看中國的金屬。

definition: toss a peach, get back a plum (idiom); to return a favor/to exchange gifts/Scratch my back, and I'll scratch yours.
to return something to its rightful owner
lit. ten thousand strings of cash in money belt (idiom); carrying lots of money/extremely wealthy/loaded
a tax declaration form/a tax return
38th parallel, forming the DMZ border between North and South Korea
(of a student) to work part-time (while continuing one's studies)/(of a delinquent) to be reformed through work and study
One-China principle, the official doctrine that Taiwan is a province of China
